de.wwu.muggl.instructions.interfaces
Interface LocalVariableAccess

All Known Implementing Classes:
ALoad, AStore, DLoad, DStore, FLoad, FStore, Iinc, ILoad, IStore, LLoad, Load, LStore, Ret, Store, Wide
public interface LocalVariableAccess

Interface that is to be implemented by any instruction that accessed exactly one local variable, reading or writing it. It only forces the implementation of the method getLocalVariableIndex().

Version:
1.0.0, 2010-03-11
Author:
Tim Majchrzak

Method Summary
 int getLocalVariableIndex()
          Get the index into the local variables that will be read and/or written to.
 

Method Detail

getLocalVariableIndex

int getLocalVariableIndex()
Get the index into the local variables that will be read and/or written to.

Returns:
The index into the local variables to be used by the implementing instruction.
